mapper.select:
select sfp.id,sfp.code,sfm.name as facilities_name,su1.actual_name as examiner_name,su1.tel as examiner_tel, sfp.status,sfp.plan_begin_date,sfp.space_time,sfp.check_rate_type,su2.actual_name as create_name from sys_facilities_plan as sfp,sys_facilities_manage as sfm,sys_user as su1,sys_user as su2,sys_facilities_category as sfc
sfp.examiner = su1.id and sfp.create_id = su2.id and sfp.facilities_manage_id = sfm.id and sfm.facilities_category_id = sfc.id
and sfc.type = #{type}
and sfp.code like concat('%',#{code},'%')
and sfm.name like concat('%',#{facilitiesName},'%')
and su1.tel like concat('%',#{tel},'%')
and sfp.is_delete = 1 and sfm.is_delete = 1 and sfc.is_delete = 1
order by sfp.create_date desc

insert into sys_facilities_execute( status, facilities_plan_id, begin_date, end_date, sort )values ( #{status}, #{facilitiesPlanId}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{sort} )
